liveOnly.label: Live Only Mode
liveOnly.tooltip: True if you want it to only run when you are live

permission.label: Permission level
permission.tooltip: Set the permission level for the command

costs.label: Cost to use the Gif:
costs.tooltip: Set the cost for this command.

setTime.label: Set Gif Duration:
setTime.tooltip: Set the amount of time the Gif will last (in seconds)

useCooldown.label: Should the Gif have a Cooldown?
useCooldown.tooltip: Adds a Cooldown to the Gif

Cooldown.label: Set Cooldown Duration:
Cooldown.tooltip: Set the Cooldown time for the Gif (in seconds)
